Key Match Events: Brandon Marsh hit a three-run home run in the bottom of the sixth inning
Nick Castellanos hit a go-ahead two-run home run in the bottom of the seventh inning
Pre-Game Insights: The game was a pivotal four-game series between the two teams
Post-Match Reflections: The win improved Philadelphia's record to 79-55, six games ahead of second-place Atlanta in the NL East standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Citizens Bank Park
Others: The starting pitchers for both teams were Charlie Morton for the Braves and Cristopher Sanchez for the Phillies
